Job Description: Software Developer - Kolkata oftware Developer)  eDominer is an IT company having its corporate office in Bangalore and development centre at Kolkata. The company provides enterprise business application on Microsoft Azure by the name expanderp.com. The company has enterprise customers across India for its cloud service expanderp.com. This software since 12 years has been actively used by enterprise into small and medium businesses. eDominer is also one of the leading consulting and training providers on technology for international IT companies like IBM,  Microsoft,  Siemens,  RBS,  S P,  Accenture and over 300+ clients globally. PeoplewareIndia.com,  SQLServerGeeks.com and SQLMaestros.com are some of the brands of eDominer highly recognized in the IT fraternity. Our software Expand ERP is delivered through cloud from various server locations across the globe. Please visit our company website www.edominer.com for more details. We are expanding our team and looking for experienced candidates in Software Developer. We have openings for senior folks as well as people with less experience. Key Skill Requirements:  Net HTML5,  CSS3 Javascript,  JSON,  JQuery Ajax,  Angular.js MS SQL /  T SQL Fluency in working on Tools Visual Studio,  SQL Management Studio
